00135         public function __construct(F3_GimmeFive_Component_Manager $componentManager, F3_MailformPlusPlus_Configuration $configuration) {
00136                 parent::__construct();
00137                 $this->componentManager = $componentManager;
00138                 $this->configuration = $configuration;
00139                 $this->cObj = t3lib_div::makeInstance('tslib_cObj');
00140                 $this->cObj->setCurrentVal($GLOBALS['TSFE']->id);
00141                 $this->typolinkConf['parameter.']['current'] = 1;
00142                 $this->typolinkConf['additionalParams'] = $this->cObj->stdWrap($typolinkConf['additionalParams'], $typolinkConf['additionalParams.']);
00143                 unset($this->typolinkConf['additionalParams.']);

00238         protected function fillMarker($term, &$markerArray, &$wrappedSubpartArray) {
00239                 $labelWrap['noTrimWrap'] = $this->configuration->offsetGet('labelWrap') ? $this->configuration->offsetGet('labelWrap') : NULL;
00240                 foreach ($term as $property => $value) {
00241                         // TODO Improve pre-processing of property-values 
00242                         if (is_array($value)) {
00243                                 $value = implode(', ', $value);
00244                         }
00245                         $propertyMarker = '###' . $this->getUpperCase($property) . '###';
00246                         $markerArray[$propertyMarker] = $term[$property] ? $value : $this->pi_getLL('na');
00247                         $labelMarker = '###' . $this->getUpperCase($property) . '_LABEL###';
00248                         $markerArray[$labelMarker] = $this->cObj->stdWrap($this->pi_getLL($property), $labelWrap);
00249                 }
00250         }
00251         
00259         protected function getUpperCase($camelCase) {
00260                 return strtoupper(preg_replace('/\p{Lu}+(?!\p{Ll})|\p{Lu}/u', '_$0', $camelCase));
00261         }
